title: Isu ka thla hmangaihtu
lyrics:
Isu ka thla hmangaihtu,
I hnenah min hruai zel rawh;
Thlemna a lo hnaih laiin,
Nangin min chawi sang langin,
Ka Chhandamtu, min hruai la,
Chatuan hmunah min thlen la;
Thlemnaah min humhim rawh,
Nangin ka thlarau nei rawh.

Ka chhandamtu ber i ni,
Ka thlarau Tlantu i ni;
Aw Isu, min kalsan suh,
Min tungdingin min pui rawh.
Nangmah chauh ring thei turin,
Ka thih hun ni thleng pawhin;
Ka Lalpa, min hruai zel rawh,
I vanram min thlentir rawh.

Aw Isu, i hnenah chauh,
Ka duh zawng zawng ka hmu ta;
Chau leh tlute tungdingin,
Mitdel, damlo tidam la,
Mi tak leh thianghlim i ni,
Kei erawh bawlhhlawh ka ni;
Sual tinrengin min bawm e,
Nang, khawngaihin i khat e.

Ka sual bawlhhlawh khuh turin,
I khawngaihna a tawk e;
Tuikhur hlu chu luantir la,
Chumi chuan min tleng fai rawh.
Nang, tuikhur hlu chu i ni,
Ka duh tawk mi intir la,
Ka thinlungah lo put la,
Chatuan thlengin luang che.
